desc: Students explore life in the German-speaking countries through reading and discussion of narrative texts. The course emphasizes vocabulary building, a thorough review of German grammar, and the composition of short narratives to develop writing skills. Taught in German with some grammar explanations in English. Prerequisite: German 112 or placement by test.
name: Intermed German I
notes: Class periods to be arranged. First class meets June 4 at 2:30 p.m. in RML WLC.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: German 112 or placement by test.
title: Intermediate German I
